detaileddescription.para: The mutex used to protect the events queue.
Tells if the control catches mouse events.
Tells if the control catches 'tab' key.
Tells if the control catches 'return' key.

memberdef.definition: using castor3d::EventHandler::EventQueue = std::deque< std::pair< UserInputEventSPtr, EventHandlerFunction > >
memberdef.name: EventQueue
